amendment.description: Amendment amends one phrase in the bill's stay provisions in Sec. 3(c) to track language used in the bill's pleading requirements in Sec. 3(d); and replaces Sec. 4(5)(c) with language making it clear that the term "qualified civil liability action" does not include an action brought under the Federal Trade Commission Act or the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to make technical and clarifying changes to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
